remarks: A function on a closed interval with nonnegative derivative is weakly increasing.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dvgt0.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
dvgt0.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
dvgt0.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A [,] B ) -cn-> RR ) ) $.
dvge0.d $e |- ( ph -> ( RR _D F ) : ( A (,) B ) --> ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
dvge0.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( A [,] B ) ) $.
dvge0.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( A [,] B ) ) $.
dvge0.l $e |- ( ph -> X <_ Y ) $.
dvge0 $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` X ) <_ ( F ` Y ) ) $.
